name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Claude Edward ALLEN, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Claude Edward ALLEN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2007, the appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Former Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
930 A.2d 1254
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Claude Edward ALLEN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 4, 2006.
Decided Aug. 20, 2007.
